markdown:
- [Zameen](https://www.zameen.com/)
- About Us

# About Us

Zameen.com is Pakistan’s Largest Online Real Estate Portal Connecting Buyers with Sellers within & outside the country

## How did it all start?

Zameen.com was the brainchild of two British-Pakistani entrepreneur brothers, Zeeshan Ali Khan and Imran Ali Khan. Their mission was to make Pakistani real estate accessible and convenient for everyone. Together, they proceeded to lead Zameen.com from a small start-up to the premier real estate entity of Pakistan.

Zameen.com started its funding first round in 2012 which constituted of several angel investors and substantial investment from venture capital firms. A further two rounds of major investment were closed in late 2015 and early 2016, bringing in a total of $29 million.

![Block Image](https://asset-cdn.zameen.com/images/about-us/about-us-block.png)

## Exclusive Marketing by Zameen.com

The team uses a 360-degree marketing strategy, covering all aspects of the projects, and helps buyers on every step of the way, with guaranteed transparency.

[View Our Projects](https://www.zameen.com/new-projects/)

![](https://asset-cdn.zameen.com/images/about-us/1@2x.png)

## What Do We Do?

Zameen.com connects buyers with sellers and tenants with landlords for highly user-friendly real estate experience. The extensive listings and projects on offer provide something for everyone when it comes to property.

![](https://asset-cdn.zameen.com/images/about-us/2@2x.png)

## Zameen Expos

The company is also the pioneer of large-scale real estate events and frequently organizes expos both locally and internationally, with exclusive event-only discounts.

[View Our Projects](https://expo.zameen.com/)

![](https://asset-cdn.zameen.com/images/about-us/3@2x.png)

## Har Pata, Humain Pata Hai!

The trust and reliability that Zameen.com brings to these projects, and the expertise of our marketing and sales teams, have led to unprecedented success, with more than 80 projects worth over PKR 160 billion marketed.

![](https://asset-cdn.zameen.com/images/about-us/4@2x.png)

### Explore Zameen

metadata.title: About Zameen.com | Pakistan’s Largest Real Estate Portal
metadata.description: Zameen.com is the first and largest property portal in Pakistan. It was founded in 2006 and has since revolutionised the real estate industry of Pakistan by connecting buyers and sellers online.
